languages.text: "Незачем взваливать на свои плечи ношу, что можно разделить с верными последователями".

traits.locale_text: "Незачем взваливать на свои плечи ношу, что можно разделить с верными последователями".

languages.text: "Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."
languages.original_text: "Незачем взваливать на свои плечи ношу, что можно разделить с верными последователями".

traits.locale_text: "Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not carried on your own shoulders."
"Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not carried on your own shoulders."
"Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."
"Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."
"Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."
"Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."

languages.text: 「負担は忠誠を誓う者たちと分け合うべきだ、ひとりで背負うものではない」
languages.original_text: "Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."

traits.locale_text: 「負担は忠誠を誓う者たちと分け合うべきだ、ひとりで背負うものではない」

languages.text: “你不该把所有的重担都一个人扛，应该让你那些忠诚的追随者帮你分担。”
languages.original_text: "Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."

traits.locale_text: “你不该把所有的重担都一个人扛，应该让你那些忠诚的追随者帮你分担。”

languages.text: « Quels que soient les fardeaux qui vous pèsent, vous devez les partager avec les sujets qui vous sont fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."

traits.locale_text: « Quels que soient les fardeaux qui vous pèsent, vous devez les partager avec les sujets qui vous sont fidèles. »

languages.text: «Comparta su carga con sus leales seguidores; no debería acarrearlas usted sola».
languages.original_text: "Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."

traits.locale_text: «Comparta su carga con sus leales seguidores; no debería acarrearlas usted sola».

languages.text: "Ihr solltet Eure Lasten mit Euren treuen Anhängern teilen, statt sie allein zu schultern."
languages.original_text: "Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr solltet Eure Lasten mit Euren treuen Anhängern teilen, statt sie allein zu schultern."

languages.text: "Yükünü tek başına sırtlanman değil, sadık takipçilerinle paylaşman uygun düşer."
languages.original_text: "Burdens ought to be shared with your loyal followers, not shouldered on your own."

traits.locale_text: "Yükünü tek başına sırtlanman değil, sadık takipçilerinle paylaşman uygun düşer."
